class.name: VisualShaderNodeReroute
class.brief_description: A node that allows rerouting a connection within the visual shader graph.
class.description: Automatically adapts its port type to the type of the incoming connection and ensures valid connections.

method.name: get_port_type
method.description: Returns the port type of the reroute node.

method.name: set_port_type
method.description: Sets the port type of the reroute node. This should not be called manually since it is automatically set by the [VisualShader].
